Uses of Interface
org.jcvi.jillion.core.util.ThrowingStream

  • Packages that use ThrowingStream 
    Package Description
    org.jcvi.jillion.assembly
    The assembly package contains objects for working with genomic data that has been assembled into Contigs and Scaffolds.
    org.jcvi.jillion.core.datastore
    The DataStore package deals with classes that represent a repository of entities.
    org.jcvi.jillion.core.util
    Contains common utility classes.
    org.jcvi.jillion.core.util.iter  
    org.jcvi.jillion.fasta.nt
    This package deals with Fasta files that contain NucleotideSequence data.
    org.jcvi.jillion.internal.assembly  
    org.jcvi.jillion.trace.fastq
    This package contains classes for dealing with fastq data.
